Assignment3

Class Tour

  • java.lang.Object
    • Assignment3.Tour

  • public class Tour
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a Tour where a Knight on an 8x8 chess board makes possible moves until there are no options left. - Knows the number of moves of the longest tour. - Knows how many tours of each length were done. - Can conduct a tour across the chess board. - Can return the longest tour and records as a multi-line string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tour(Board board, Knight knight)
      Creates a new Tour that the Knight will be doing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void conductTour() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString will return a multi-line string containing a record of the most successful tour, and a record of all the tours this will override the standard toString method in java

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tour

        public Tour(Board board,
            Knight knight)
        Creates a new Tour that the Knight will be doing. We need to read from the board and knights possible moves so they will be passed in as parameters
        Parameters:
        board - the chess board our Tour is using to refer to
        knight - the knight object the tour is using to move around the board

    • Method Detail

      • conductTour

        public void conductTour()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString will return a multi-line string containing a record of the most successful tour, and a record of all the tours this will override the standard toString method in java
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a multi-line string with the chess board of the most successful tour, and a record of all the tours
